cards.rules_text:
Whenever Ziya, Expert Angler enters or attacks, draw a card, then discard a card.
Ziya, Expert Angler gets +4/+0 as long as there are four or more creature cards in your graveyard.

Choose one:
• Target player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker.
• Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

cards.rules_text: Search your library for a nonland card not named Thin the Veil, exile it, then shuffle. If it has mana value less than or equal to the number of card types among cards in your graveyard, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. If you don't, put it into your hand.
Look at the top eight cards of your library. Put four of them into your hand, and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Seize the future for the present's sake.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
[i]Spell mastery[/i] — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, instead counter that spell unless its controller pays {4}.

cards.special_text:
Whenever a player discards one or more cards, put a loyalty counter on An Uninvited Guest.
[+1]: Create a 1/1 green Elemental creature token.
[-3]: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Target player mills three cards.
[-7]: Return target creature card from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control. If its mana value is 4 or less, put three +1/+1 counters on it.

cards.rules_text:
Haste
Whenever Minyet, Hoardseeker attacks, create a Treasure token.
At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice a permanent unless you've sacrificed a permanent this turn.
Draw two cards, then discard two cards unless you discard a noncreature, nonland card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]No path left unconsidered. No movement made carelessly.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
{T}: Add {U} or {R}. You lose 1 life.
{2}{U}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Reclaimed Academy: Exile up to two instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard. Create that many 1/1 blue Wizard creature tokens with prowess.

At the beginning of your upkeep, surveil 1. Then if you have twelve or more cards in your graveyard, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)[/i]

As New Divide enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.
{T}, Sacrifice New Divide: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
